comment.author: 66476005@N00
comment._content: That's an outstanding image. Appears they're just cruising up and down the avenue, having a big time showing off for the spectators.

comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: Looking at the right side of the photo, it appears to have been taken from the upper level of a city bus. The sidewalks look jammed. Easter parade was obviously a big deal then. And people showed off their cars as well as their finery.
